name: GetActiveDiscounts
description: Returns all active discounts within an organization unit
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `Discounts:View`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

B.name: DiscountTriggers
B.description:
Include discounts based on trigger type. Defaults to automatic.
Possible values:

* `-1` - SystemManaged
* `0` - Automatic
* `1` - Manual
* `2` - Coupon
* `4` - Bundles
* `5` - Loyalty

B.name: OrganizationUnitID
B.description:
Defaults to current organization unit.

This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

D.name: Code
D.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

D.name: Message
D.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

D.name: RequestID
D.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

D.name: Type
D.description: A short description of the error type.

H.name: FinancialDispersion
H.description:
Possible values:

* `0` - DivideInProportionToProductPrice
* `1` - MostExpensiveToCheapest
* `2` - CheapestToMostExpensive
* `3` - HighestToLowestTaxRate
* `4` - LowestToHighestTaxRate

CH.name: Operator
CH.description:

* `1` - NotEquals
* `2` - LowerThan
* `3` - LowerThanOrEqualTo
* `4` - HigherThanOrEqualTo
* `5` - HigherThan
* `7` - Contains
* `8` - DoesNotContain
* `9` - StartsWith
* `10` - DoesNotStartWith
* `11` - EndsWith
* `12` - DoesNotEndWith
* `13` - HasValue
* `14` - DoesntHaveValue

CK.name: OrderProperties
CK.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - IsPickup
* `2` - CreatedByEmployee
* `4` - IsInterbranch
* `8` - IsB2B
* `16` - Duplicated
* `32` - Autocompleted
* `128` - ReturnToSupplier
* `256` - CustomTaxesApplied
* `512` - Replenishment
* `1024` - SoldByOverridden
* `2048` - ImportedFromLiveGuard
* `4096` - IsTransferOrder
* `8192` - IsReturnsTransferOrder
* `16384` - IsOffer
* `32768` - IsUnified
* `65536` - IsReturned
* `131072` - HasReturnLines
* `262144` - DownPayment
* `524288` - Restitution
* `1048576` - Repairs
* `2097152` - IsReturnReversal

CN.name: OrganizationUnitTypes
CN.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Shop
* `2` - WebShop
* `4` - Container
* `8` - Pickup
* `16` - Warehouse
* `36` - Country
* `64` - Franchise
* `128` - EVA
* `256` - TestOrganizationUnit
* `512` - DisableLogin
* `1024` - Supplier
* `1024` - ExternalSupplier
* `3072` - Consignment
* `4096` - B2b
* `8196` - Region
* `16384` - ReturnsPortal
* `32768` - Restitution
* `65536` - RepairCenter
* `131072` - Mobile
* `262144` - ConcessionStore

CT.name: UserTypes
CT.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Employee
* `2` - Customer
* `4` - Anonymous
* `8` - Business
* `17` - System
* `64` - Debtor
* `512` - Tester
* `1024` - RemovedByRequest
* `2048` - Api
* `4096` - Impersonated

BU.name: ID
BU.description: This is the ID of a `DiscountCondition`

F.name: DiscountID
F.description: This is the ID of a `Discount`

E.name: LayerID
E.description: This is the ID of a `DiscountLayer`

CV.name: ExternalIDs
CV.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

CV.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
CV.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

CV.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
CV.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
